title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: But in YetholmLoch (a romantic sheet of water, in the dry march,as it is called), (here are the remains of a fortresscalled Lochside Tower, which, like the supposedCastle of Avenel, is built upon an island, and connected with the land by a causeway.
